about_the_game:
Step into the haunting world of "Phantom Asylum", a gripping VR psychological horror game that will test both your courage and your sanity. Explore the dark, abandoned halls of a long-forgotten mental institution, where ghostly presences and disturbing visions blur the line between reality and madness.

In "Phantom Asylum", it’s not just the lurking phantoms you need to fear, but also your own mind. With every turn, your perception of reality grows more unstable. Will you be able to keep your sanity intact, or will you fall victim to the illusions that stalk you? The only way out is to solve the asylum’s twisted mysteries and confront the horrors waiting for you in the shadows.

  • Atmospheric Horror: Immerse yourself in the chilling environment of a haunted mental asylum where every shadow hides a secret.

  • Mind-Bending Gameplay: Face psychological challenges as reality distorts and your mind is pushed to its limits.

  • Immersive VR Experience: Feel every moment of fear and tension in this fully realized virtual reality horror adventure.

  • Puzzles and Secrets: Uncover the dark past of the asylum by solving puzzles and uncovering hidden clues.

Surviving this asylum isn’t just about bravery; it’s about keeping your mind intact. Will you escape, or will you be consumed by the madness within "Phantom Asylum"?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit İşlemci Ve işletim sistemi gerektirir.
  • Processor: intel i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 2060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR Oculus SDK

short_description: "Phantom Asylum" is a VR horror experience set in an abandoned mental hospital haunted by restless phantoms. Navigate its twisted corridors, where every step could lead you deeper into madness. Can you survive the asylum's secrets, or will you become another ghost trapped within its walls?
